chunks.content: Throughout a career spanning 19 years, she has sold over 118 million records as a solo artist, and a further 60 million with Destiny's Child, making her one of the best-selling music artists of all time.

metadata.relevance_reason: This part directly answers the question about the number of records sold by Beyoncé during her career.
metadata.answer_contribution: Beyoncé has sold over 118 million records as a solo artist and 60 million with Destiny's Child.
